name: Последствия
description:
This game is temporarily in Russian

During the Second World War,

the Germans looted, did not spare civilians,

burned villages and at some point they entered the wrong village

✞✞✞✞✞✞✞✞✞✞✞✞✞✞✞✞✞✞✞✞✞✞✞✞✞✞✞✞✞✞✞✞✞✞✞✞

Who but children are responsible for the sins of their ancestors? Try to get out of the maze alive, collect the story and repent of your sins

💀💀💀

  • An ever-changing labyrinth from which you need to find a way out
  • He can appear from anywhere at any moment
  • Plot based on real events

Thanks for playing my game!
